DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect bexagliflozin lower hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) level patient type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) moderate renal impairment .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Bexagliflozin Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients With Moderate Renal Impairment
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 52 investigative site globally plan participate study . An estimated 300 subject poorly control T2DM moderate renal impairment randomly assign receive bexagliflozin tablet , 20 mg , placebo equal ratio 24 week .
